faqs.question: How can I reset my password?
faqs.answer: To reset your password, go to the login page and click the 'Forgot Password' link. You will receive an email with instructions on how to create a new password for your account.

faqs.question: How to send login credentials to the client in PAS (Profit Acceleration Software)?
faqs.answer: Login to Profit Acceleration Software, search the client's name then click the 3 dots menu and click send credentials.

faqs.question: How can I add other eBooks to the website?
faqs.answer: Upload the files to Media Storage, copy and then paste the link in the Customize Website form page 4.

faqs.question: How do I add my client's logo in my testimonial page/section?
faqs.answer: Go to your FBS account and upload your client's logo (if this hasn't done yet). Then on the side panel of the site look for the menu/link/tab that says Customize Website. Then, go to page 2 and look for the field that says Client # - Logo. Copy the image/logo link from the media storage and paste on the field.
